channel.title: Quest Tab Ideas
channel.description:
Alright, I need some ideas to add to my quest tab, OTHER than the following.. 1. Quests 2. The average Pk'ing server tab (displaying pkpoints other types of points) 3. Something already made or on a server -------------------- Please just list your ideas of something original I can add to me quest tab.. I have just cleared it, and was thinking of achievements and had saw it was already invented... So let me know some original ideas.. Thanks, Trade me..
CURRENT RESULTS: [IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/IdeasNeeded.png[/img]

item.description:

Make actual useful and decent achievements.
